html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-03702023-04-21TC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectOrder Authorizing the Transfer to PMG Technologies Inc. of the use of Certain Movable Public Properties
PrecisOrder (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2022-1155 of October 20, 2022; and (2) authorizing the Minister of Transport to TRANSFER to PMG TECHNOLOGIES INC. the use of certain movable public properties listed in or contemplated by contract T8127-200020/001/MTP made by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services, pertaining to the operation and maintenance of the Motor Vehicle Test Centre at Blainville, Quebec, for the period beginning on July 1, 2023 and ending on March 31, 2038.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Order Authorizing the Transfer to PMG Technologies Inc. of the use of Certain Movable Public Properties
precis: Order (1) repealing Order in Council P.C. 2022-1155 of October 20, 2022; and (2) authorizing the Minister of Transport to TRANSFER to PMG TECHNOLOGIES INC. the use of certain movable public properties listed in or contemplated by contract T8127-200020/001/MTP made by the Minister of Public Works and Government Services, pertaining to the operation and maintenance of the Motor Vehicle Test Centre at Blainville, Quebec, for the period beginning on July 1, 2023 and ending on March 31, 2038.
